key.description: The tile types that will be used in this level's layout. Every key inside here must be exactly one character long and it must not be a space.

tile.description: If present, this character will represent a tile. This object's data define the properties of this tile.

type.description: The type of this tile. Can be "normal".
type.markdownDescription: The type of this tile. Can be `"normal"`.

layout.description: The layout of the level. Only characters defined inside of the key field can be used in the layout. Additionally, a space represents an empty field.
layout.markdownDescription: The layout of the level. Only characters defined inside of the `key` field can be used in the layout. Additionally, a space represents an empty field.

items.description: A single row of the layout. Every row must have the same width.
